txt.en: Collected a token of Dol Guldur ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Elves of the Golden Host landed on the eastern shore of the Anduin and drove a wedge through the heart of the Orcs, but there is still danger within the Mirk-eaves.

'We took the Orcs by surprise when we landed, and quickly routed them into the forest; however, we believe they may either have another camp nearby or are preparing a retaliatory assault, for we have recently seen goblin-scouts on occasion.

'We have dispatched our own patrols to find their camp, but have thus far been unsuccessful. If you would, scour the Mirk-eaves for these elusive scouts. Perhaps they may carry some clue as to their camp's whereabouts. They have a mastery of stealth, so it may be difficult to find them.

'Also, you should speak with Tethafnel and Faroniel here at Echad Sirion. They may have other tasks for you.'

Goblin-scouts can be found sneaking throughout the Mirk-eaves.\n\nFalasgon has asked you to find and defeat some of the goblin-scouts that have been spotted near Echad Sirion. Perhaps they might carry something that will suggest the location of their camp.
'These tokens bespeak of several encampments, [placeholder]. I will send scouts out immediately to find them.\n\n'Remain here, though...I may yet have a task for you....'
Falasgon is at Echad Sirion in the Mirk-eaves.\n\nYou should bring the tokens you found to Falasgon for his examination.
'Have you learned anything yet? We have seen goblin-scouts throughout the mirk-eaves, but they are masters of stealth.'
'Did you find no evidence of the goblins?'
'These tokens denote different tribes or companies. This does not bode well....'
'There are more Orcs here than we first realized....'
Collect tokens of Dol Guldur from goblin-scouts ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Falasgon at Echad Sirion
Talk to Falasgon at Echad Sirion
